parameters.content:
## 💰 INVESTMENT & ROI

**Pilot Build:** ₹40,000 (one-time)
**API Cost:** ~₹500-1,500/month (OpenAI + Search)
**Maintenance:** Optional ₹5,000/month

---

**⏱️ Time Saved:** 15-20 hrs/week
**💵 Cost per copy set:** Under ₹5
**💵 Current cost:** ₹2,000-5,000 (freelancer) or 4-6 hrs (in-house)

**🎯 ROI: Pays for itself in Week 1.**

message.content:
=You are a pharmaceutical research analyst. Research the supplement ingredient "{{ $json['Product or Ingredient Name'] }}" and provide:

1. TOP 3 CLINICAL BENEFITS — cite specific studies, dosages, and measurable outcomes (e.g., "500mg daily reduced X by 23% in a 12-week RCT")
2. MECHANISM OF ACTION — how it works in the body (simple, clear)
3. RECOMMENDED DOSAGE — standard effective dose range
4. SAFETY PROFILE — any contraindications or side effects
5. KEY DIFFERENTIATOR — what makes this ingredient special vs alternatives

Be specific. Include numbers, study references, and clinical data. No generic claims.

=Analyze how top D2C supplement brands in India are marketing "{{ $json['Product or Ingredient Name'] }}" products. Look at brands like Setu, Wellbeing Nutrition, Oziva, Plix, Carbamide Forte on Amazon.in, Nykaa, 1mg.

Provide:
1. TOP 3 COMPETITOR PRODUCT NAMES & PRICES
2. MOST USED CLAIMS — what benefits do they highlight?
3. COMMON HOOKS — what language patterns work? (e.g., "clinically proven", "doctor recommended")
4. GAP ANALYSIS — what are competitors NOT saying that Setu could own?
5. BEST-SELLING FORMAT — capsules, gummies, powder, effervescent?

Be specific with brand names, prices, and exact copy phrases used.

values.content:
=You are the Head of Content at Setu Nutrition (setu.in) — India's premium, science-backed supplement brand founded by Nihaal Mariwala.

Brand Voice: Clean. Trustworthy. Science-forward. Premium but approachable. Never salesy or exaggerated.
Brand Values: Transparency, clinical backing, daily wellness made simple.

---

PRODUCT / INGREDIENT: {{ $json.product_name }}
TARGET AUDIENCE: {{ $json.target_audience }}
COPY TYPE REQUESTED: {{ $json.copy_type }}

📊 CLINICAL RESEARCH:
{{ $json.clinical_research }}

📈 COMPETITOR ANALYSIS:
{{ $json.competitor_analysis }}

---

Generate ALL of the following in clean, structured format:

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
📄 1. PRODUCT PAGE DESCRIPTION
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
- 150-200 words
- Lead with the #1 consumer benefit (not the ingredient name)
- Include 2-3 specific research-backed claims with numbers
- Mention dosage and form factor
- End with a confident CTA
- Write in Setu's tone: clean, premium, science-backed

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
📱 2. SOCIAL MEDIA CAPTIONS (3 variants)
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Each caption:
- 80-120 words
- Pattern-interrupt hook in first line
- 3 benefit bullets with emojis
- Strong CTA
- 5 relevant hashtags including #SetuNutrition

Variant A: Educational / myth-busting
Variant B: Lifestyle / aspirational
Variant C: Testimonial-style / social proof

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
📢 3. AD COPY (3 variants, 30-50 words each)
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
- Variant A: Problem → Solution
- Variant B: Benefit-led (transformation)
- Variant C: Social proof / statistic-led

Include suggested CTA button text for each.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
✉️ 4. EMAIL SUBJECT LINES (5 options)
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
Mix of:
- Curiosity gap
- Benefit-first
- Urgency/FOMO
- Question-based
- Personal/conversational

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
🔬 5. RESEARCH SUMMARY & COMPLIANCE FLAGS
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
- Key clinical claims used (with source references)
- Flag any claims that need FSSAI/AYUSH compliance review
- Recommended disclaimers

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
💡 6. CONTENT STRATEGY NOTES
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
- Top 3 angles competitors are missing
- Suggested influencer talking points
- Recommended content formats (reel, carousel, blog)

Write copy that converts. Be specific. No fluff. Every claim must be backed by the research provided.

parameters.jsCode:
// Get AI output and metadata const aiOutput = $('AI — Generate Copy Variants').item.json.message?.content || $('AI — Generate Copy Variants').item.json.choices?.[0]?.message?.content || 'Copy generation completed — check raw output'; const product = $('Prepare AI Context1').item.json.product_name; const audience = $('Prepare AI Context1').item.json.target_audience; const copyType = $('Prepare AI Context1').item.json.copy_type; const timestamp = new Date().toLocaleString('en-IN', { timeZone: 'Asia/Kolkata' }); // Convert markdown-style formatting to HTML let formattedContent = aiOutput // Section headers with dividers .replace(/━+/g, '') .replace(/^(📄|📱|📢|✉️|🔬|💡)\s*\d+\.\s*(.+)$/gm, '$1 $2') // Bold text .replace(/\*\*(.+?)\*\*/g, '$1') // Variant headers .replace(/^(Variant [A-C]:?.*)$/gm, '$1') // Bullet points with checkmarks .replace(/^[-•]\s*(.+)$/gm, '✦$1') // Numbered items .replace(/^(\d+)\.\s*(.+)$/gm, '$1.$2') // Regular paragraphs .replace(/^(?!$1') // Clean up empty lines .replace(/^\s*$/gm, ''); // Build the full branded HTML email const htmlEmail = `
SETU
Nutrition Science
✨ AI-Generated Content Ready for Review
Product
${product}
Audience
${audience}
Copy Type
${copyType}
${formattedContent}
Powered by
Agentic AI Hub
Turning AI into Outcomes
Built by AIwithDhruv
Generated on ${timestamp} IST
`; return [{ json: { htmlEmail: htmlEmail, rawContent: aiOutput, product_name: product, target_audience: audience, copy_type: copyType, generated_at: timestamp } }];

parameters.content:
## 📤 STAGE 6 — DELIVERY

Results go to **two places automatically:**

**Google Sheet** → Master content library.
Columns: Product, Audience, Copy Type, Content, Timestamp.
Every SKU's copy logged, searchable, reusable.

**Branded Email** → Sent directly to the content team.
Formatted HTML report. Ready to review, edit, publish.

🔄 No manual copy-pasting
🔄 No "where's the copy?" messages
🔄 No version confusion
🔄 Complete audit trail

parameters.formDescription: Enter a product name or ingredient to generate research-backed marketing copy

parameters.content:
## 🧬 SETU NUTRITION — AI Research & Copywriting Pipeline

**Built by:** Agentic AI Hub (AIwithDhruv)
**For:** Setu Nutrition Content Team

---

### What This Does
Your team enters a **product or ingredient name** → the system automatically:

1. **Researches** clinical studies & competitor copy via Perplexity AI
2. **Generates** 10+ ready-to-use copy variants via GPT
3. **Formats** output into a branded HTML email report
4. **Delivers** results to Google Sheet + email

### Time Saved
⏱️ **Before:** 4-6 hours per product (manual research + writing)
⏱️ **After:** Under 2 minutes. Fully automated.

### ROI
With 50+ SKUs and constant launches, this saves **15-20 hours/week** for your content team.

## 📥 STAGE 1 — INPUT

Simple form — anyone on Setu's team can use it.

**No technical skills needed.**

Just type the product name, pick the copy type, and hit submit.

✅ Works on mobile too
✅ Can be shared as a link
✅ Triggers the entire pipeline automatically

## 🔍 STAGE 2 — AI-POWERED RESEARCH

Two Perplexity AI searches run **simultaneously**:

**Research A:** Clinical studies — PubMed, RCTs, dosage data, mechanism of action, safety profiles

**Research B:** Competitor intelligence — how Amazon, Nykaa, 1mg brands position the same ingredient. Pricing, claims, gaps.

💡 This replaces 2-3 hours of manual Googling with **real-time AI research in seconds**.

🔬 Perplexity returns cited, sourced data — not generic AI fluff.

## 🧠 STAGE 3 — CONTEXT ASSEMBLY

Research from both Perplexity calls is **merged and structured**.

The AI copywriter receives:
→ Product / ingredient name
→ Target audience profile
→ Clinical research with citations
→ Competitor positioning & gaps
→ Requested copy type

This ensures every word written is backed by **real data and market intelligence**.

## ✍️ STAGE 4 — COPY GENERATION

GPT generates **all variants in one shot:**

📄 Product Page Description (150-200 words)
📱 3x Social Media Captions (educational, lifestyle, social proof)
📢 3x Ad Copy variants + CTA buttons
✉️ 5x Email Subject Lines (curiosity, benefit, urgency)
🔬 Research summary + FSSAI compliance flags
💡 Content strategy notes + influencer talking points

**Output is written in Setu's brand voice.**
Tone: science-backed, clean, premium, trustworthy.

⚡ One form submission = full content pack for any SKU.

## 🎨 STAGE 5 — BRANDED FORMATTING

Raw AI output is transformed into a **professional HTML email report** with:

→ Setu brand header & color scheme
→ Product / audience / type metadata bar
→ Structured sections with visual hierarchy
→ Compliance flags highlighted
→ "Powered by Agentic AI Hub" footer
→ IST timestamp

📧 The email Nihaal receives looks like it came from a **₹5L/year content agency** — not an automation.

✅ Copy-paste ready for the content team.

## 🚀 PHASE 2 — EXPANSION OPTIONS

**Once this pipeline is proven, we can add:**

→ WhatsApp alerts when copy is ready
→ Auto-post to Instagram / LinkedIn
→ Email campaign builder (full drip sequences)
→ SEO blog post pipeline from same research
→ Multilingual copy — Hindi, Tamil, Bengali
→ Review/UGC collector & repurposer
→ Cart abandonment email sequences
→ Product launch content calendar
→ Amazon listing optimizer

---
📞 **Built by Agentic AI Hub**
🔗 calendly.com/aiwithdhruv/makeaiworkforyou

## 💰 INVESTMENT & ROI

**Pilot Build:** ₹40,000 (one-time)
**API Cost:** ~₹500-1,500/month (OpenAI + Search)
**Maintenance:** Optional ₹5,000/month

---

**⏱️ Time Saved:** 15-20 hrs/week
**💵 Cost per copy set:** Under ₹5
**💵 Current cost:** ₹2,000-5,000 (freelancer) or 4-6 hrs (in-house)

**🎯 ROI: Pays for itself in Week 1.**
